databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI_ID ,
MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.MONTH , MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.SHIME_BI ,
MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.SEND_FLAG , MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.DATA_NO , MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.USER_KEY , MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.RENEW_DATE , MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI.TS FROM MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI
WHERE 1 = 1

INSERT INTO MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI ( MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI_ID ,
MONTH , SHIME_BI ,
SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI_ID ,
:MONTH , :SHIME_BI ,
:SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI SET MONTH =:MONTH , SHIME_BI =:SHIME_BI ,
SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI_ID =:MS_SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_BI_ID
